ovdesc.p: Payment Order parameter application describes the features which connects Payment Order and Payment System

desc.p: ID of Payment order parameter record
Validation Rules:1. Valid company code 2. Valid company Mnemonic 3. Lead company 4. Company should not be accounting company, reporting company and consolidation company
Define the connection between the Payment system and the Payment order External - Send the Payment order details to External Payment System TPS - Send the Payment order details to TPS
Validation Rules: Mandatory field To select TPS option PP must be installed in the company

To define if warehouse is required at Payment order level or not. If specified as NO, then the future dated payment orders will be sent for payment system immediately. If set as YES, then the future dated payment orders will be executed only on the SOD of the future date
Validation Rules: Default value to be N

Record's payment status which are to be moved to history. If this field is not defined, then by default the payment orders with CURRENT.STATE as Placed and CancelOrder status will move to history. If any status is defined in this field, then the payment order with CURRENT.STATE as Placed (or CancelOrder) and Payment system status as the status defined in this field will be moved to history
Validation Rules: Null multi-value set is not allowed. Duplicate values not allowed
No. of days that an order will remain in live (in the status defined in the above field) before moving to history
Validation Rules: nC, nW - n denotes no. of days, C - calendar days, W- working days. It should be in valid format. Default 0
Field to attach any local routine to map any additional fields from payment order table to TPS

p.p: Validation Rules: A valid record released in EB.API application.
Routine should accept five arguments as mentioned below poContractId - IN, poContract - IN, inTpsRec - INOUT(FM separated array in which any required additional payment order fields to be mapped),

desc.p: Field which holds the EB.MAPPING record that would map any additional fields from payment order table to TPS

p.p: Validation Rules: Should be a valid record from EB.MAPPING.SOURCE
